Erratum Erratum to “Bulk oxidation state of the different cationic elements in the MoVTe(Sb)NbO catalysts for oxidation or ammoxidation of propane” [Applied Catalysis A: General 279 (2005) 67–77] Manuel Baca Jean-Marc M. Millet * Institut de Recherches sur la Catalyse, CNRS, Conventionné Avec l’Université Claude, Bernard, Lyon I, 2 Avenue A, Einstein, F-69626 Villeurbanne Cedex, France * Corresponding author. Tel.: +33 472445317; fax: +33 472445399. The Publisher regrets that in the original printing of the above-mentioned article, three equations cited on lines 17, 46 and 575, were printed incorrectly. These equations are now cited in their correct form below. Line 17: (AO)2−2x (A2O) x M20O56 Line 46: (AO)2−2x (A2O) x M20O56 Line 575: (Sb5+O)2−2x (Sb2 3+O) x M20O56
